GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v6.0.6
GSD.description:
scsi: lpfc: Fix memory leak in lpfc_create_port()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.6 by commit 5ea1f195f51c2bb5915ccfb2b2885ca81ce9262b, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 5e633302ace1f61f8ea5a3ce21e19a4d79126cca. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: scsi: lpfc: Fix memory leak in lpfc_create_port()
OSV.details:
